name: raycase-virtualhere-wooting60he
title: Wooting 60HE+ via VirtualHere
description: Easily manage your Wooting 60HE+ keyboard's VirtualHere connection directly from Raycast.
author: grad.dev

commands.name: main
commands.title: Wooting 60HE+
commands.description: Easily manage your Wooting 60HE+ keyboard's VirtualHere connection directly from Raycast.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
